Key Match Events: Malaysia lost the match 1-0 to Bahrain in the AFC Asian Cup Group E match.
Bahrain scored a late winner with a goal by Ali Madan in the 88th minute.
Malaysia had several chances but failed to convert them into goals.
Post-Match Reflections: The coach Kim Pan Gon was praised for his solid defensive plans but criticized for his ineffective substitutions.
Players expressed frustration over the missed opportunities and the late winner by Bahrain.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Jassim bin Hamad Stadium in Doha, Bahrain.
The result ended Malaysia's hopes of advancing to the knockout stage of the AFC Asian Cup.
Others: The performance of the players was evaluated with grades ranging from 4/10 to 7/10.
The match was Malaysia's second group game in the tournament.
